content: - designed by juan the yarn addict materials 4 weight yarn 6 0 mm hook scissors darning needle abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet st s stitch es to begin chain 4 and sl to the first chain chain circle formed round 1 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 11 double_crochet in the chain circle slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 1 double_crochet in same st insert 2 double_crochet in each st from the remaining round slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 2 double_crochet in the next st * insert 1 double_crochet in the next st and 2 double_crochet in the following st repeat * until the end of the round slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 36 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 1 double_crochet in the next st insert 2 double_crochet in the following st * insert 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts and 2 double_crochet in the following st repeat * until the end of the round slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 48 double_crochet round 5 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts insert 2 double_crochet in the next st * insert 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts and 2 double_crochet in the following st repeat * until the end of the round slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 60 double_crochet end of increase rounds rounds 6-30 chain 2 counts as a half_double_crochet insert 1 half_double_crochet in each st of the round slip to the top chain before the next st to close the round 60 half_double_crochet tie off and sew in ends approximate measurement 12 inches long x 10 inches wide measurement is approximate and will vary based on gauge used copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only it may not be reproduced distributed or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends jtya designs be sure to check out more of my designs… tutorials on youtube and patterns on ravelry emberfell cowl guiding points of light shawl
